column1: Smoque BBQ////Finally took a little trip to Smoque BBQ on a Sunday afternoon (11:45am) and it was busy but not lines out the door busy. Â Was able to find parking in the back lot. Big blackboard for the menu. Boyfriend and I ordered the St. Louis Ribs and Brisket. I am in love with the Brisket! This was my 1st time trying it and not my last! Soo yummy and tender
column2: melt in your mouth good! The ribs were pretty yummy too but I have had other ribs that I like better. Sides got the mac and cheese it was yummy
column3: fries were good too! Tried the peach cobbler.. didn't really care for it but my boyfriend enjoyed it. The seating is kind of cramped but they do a good job of seating people.
